summary: DOD's Defense Security Service determines government contractors' eligibility to access classified information and monitors over 12,000 contractor facilities. It is facing new challenges as adversaries try to steal national security information and technology at unprecedented rates. DSS is piloting a new approach that requires collaboration with stakeholders such as other federal agencies and contractors. However, we found that it has not established how it will...
title: Protecting Classified Information: Defense Security Service Should Address Challenges as New Approach Is Piloted
